dict.string:
Set the source podcast for your widget.
[DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(201) DONT_LOCALIZE] Podcast properties [DONT_LOCALIZE Help, URL(http://www.apple.com/ilife/tutorials/iweb/iw1-8.html) DONT_LOCALIZE] Podcast publishing

Provide an identifier and version number for your widget.
[DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(200) DONT_LOCALIZE] Attributes

Preview your widget's default image and exclude items on the canvas that have text.
[DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(103) DONT_LOCALIZE] Default image preview [DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(101) DONT_LOCALIZE] Canvas [DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(303) DONT_LOCALIZE] Attributes inspector

Create an icon for your widget by placing art and adjusting the icon's properties in the Fill & Stroke inspector.
[DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(104) DONT_LOCALIZE] Widget icon composer [DONT_LOCALIZE GoTo, Tag(301) DONT_LOCALIZE] Fill & Stroke inspector

Run your widget to test it and track down problems.
When you're finished with testing, deploy your widget to share it.

image-theme: 1; image-shape: 3; image-opacity: 1.00; image-top-color: 0.4000,1.0000,1.0000; image-bottom-color: 0.0000,0.2510,0.5020; image-radius: 13,13,13,13; image-border: 1; image-border-color: 0.7500,0.7500,0.7500; image-border-width: 1; shine-include-shine: 0; shine-include-alphas: 0; shine-height: 0.51; glass-include-arc: 1; shine-include-bottom: 0; shine-over-border: 0; image-include-custom: 1; image-custom-above-lighting: 0; image-custom-center: 0; image-custom-x: 23.90; image-custom-y: 23.10; image-custom-resize-to-fit: 0; shadow-include-shadow: 1; shadow-blur: 6.00; shadow-offset: 0.00,-3.00; shadow-color: 0.0000,0.0000,0.0000,0.3333;
